name: Sky Cycle
description:
Please enjoy the first project developed by Tektonik Software, a game development startup out of NYC! Sky Cycle is an endless runner type game where you control a motorcycle zooming through the skies on a galactic highway, avoiding cars on both sides of the road, but be careful not to fall off the sides! 

We hope you enjoy this title, and if you do or don't please comment any feedback you may have! This studio has many more projects in the works, ones much grander and ambitious than this, but please enjoy this creative rendition of a classic game genre we all know and love!
